metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2191 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Jetty versions 10.0.0 thru 10.0.9, and 11.0.0 thru 11.0.9versions, SslConnection does not release ByteBuffers from configuredByteBufferPool in case of error code paths.

criterions.comment: jetty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
jetty8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
jetty9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
